title: Calories in 1 Cup Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 cup sugar, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per 100 g basis with quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Granulated white sugar; 1 cup ≈ 200 g (packed, level measure).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, brand, granularity, and measurement method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1 cup granulated sugar contains ~774 kcal, all from 200 g of carbs (pure sugars).

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use powdered sugar (1 cup ≈ 120 g total)
Substitute with stevia (zero-calorie, per cup equivalent)

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup of granulated sugar?
Is all the calories in sugar from carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, 100% carbs—200 g total, all as sugars, with 0 g protein or fat.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in 1 cup?
faqs.a: About 200 g of pure sucrose in granulated white sugar.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have fewer calories than white?
faqs.a: Slightly—~380 kcal per 100 g vs. 387 kcal, due to minor molasses content.
